item.title: What we know about Maduro's capture
item.description: Maduro and his wife were taken from "a house that was more like a fortress", Donald Trump says.

item.title: BBC reaches agreement with Israeli family for filming in home after 7 October without consent
item.description: The family who survived the Hamas attack in 2023 call the incident an “intrusion”.

item.title: Two die and third person missing after coastal search
item.description: One witness saw three people in rough seas in Withernsea, with a woman being swept away on Friday.

item.title: UK 'not involved in any way' in US strike on Venezuela, Starmer says
item.description: The PM has not spoken to US President Donald Trump about the US seizure of President Nicolas Maduro.

item.title: Teenage life was an ordeal, until she found her calm with a camera
item.description: Caitlyn McDonald has Autism and Auditory Processing Disorder - a condition that affects how the brain interprets sounds.
